welcometext2:
It is with joy that we invite you to join us for a day we’ve long awaited. We are coming together in marriage, and we wish to have those dearest to us by our side.

This day will be marked by warmth, simplicity, and the strength of lasting vows. Here, you’ll find the details that matter—the ceremony, the celebration, and how you can be a part of this cherished time.

Your presence, laughter, and blessings mean the world to us. Please let us know if you’ll join us by confirming in the confirmation section.

Thank you for being with us on this journey.
ceremonyLocation: Parroquia de la Asunción de Nuestra Señora, Pozuelo
giftsText: We are grateful to celebrate this special day with you. The wedding is fully paid by us, but if you wish to give a gift, you can do so through the following account:
